subject: Amazon order still not shipped
description_text:
Hi, I did a purchase of a pedal set and a shifter on December 15th.
Until now, the itens were not shipped and delivery date was moved to December 31st.

I am leaving us on December 29th.
Should I cancel the order?

Order number: 111-0459836-2471424

Tod 
Rafael Palacio

conversations.body_text: Hi Rafael Palacio,  OK, We will cancel it.
